summary: An ordinance accepting the condemnation awards for land and other property in the Sander-Boman Real Estate Co.'s 1st Addition and Walla Walla Addition for park and playground purposes (Garfield Playfield extension) contemplated by Ordinance 83569, King County Cause No. 478647, and providing for payment by warrants and bonds of the district; and accepting the offer of the City Employees' Retirement System to purchase the same.
committee: Finance and Parks and Public Grounds
